* BrightBlade looked at Gangon and snarled, 'Be careful?' yeah right!
She knew what to do and what not to do, she didn't need anybot telling her 
that!
She followed Gangon into the passage way, she didn't fully trust him and if 
this was a trick he would soon be eating pulse laser!*
